biking home, turn onto hanna st

2002-11-26

and i notice the stars get brighter because there are less street lamps... i have been riding with my hands over my ears, so that i can hear the rubber on the road as vibrations through the frame and the seat and my spine and skull... and i look up at the stars on the fast little road and let out a

wow

and the position of my head looking up
makes
my
breath
fog
up
my
glasses
